description: Non Material Amendment to Planning Permission 21/01700/HOU (Erection of single storey side/rear extension and front porch extension) to replace from white painted brick facade to white rendered brick

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: Condition 1 of 21/01700/HOU is amended as follows:The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details: Site Location Plan B79570 - 1500A Existing and Proposed Block Plans B79570 - 3100A Proposed Ground and First Floor Plans B79570 - 3101A Proposed Loft Plan and Roof Plan B79570 - 3202B Proposed ElevationsB79570 - 3203B Proposed ElevationsB79570 - 3300A Proposed Section AA Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
